abstract.text: View major documentation updates and highlights from WWDC, browse ongoing updates from a set of framework releases over time, and jump to the latest release notes.
Learn about important changes to ARKit.
Learn about important changes to AVFAudio.
Learn about important changes to AVFoundation.
Learn about important changes to Accelerate.
Learn about important changes to Accessibility.
Learn about important changes in ActivityKit.
Learn about important changes to AdAttributionKit.
Learn about important changes in App Intents.
Learn about important changes to AppKit.
Learn about important changes to Apple Intelligence.
Learn about important changes to Apple Pencil.
Learn about important changes to Audio Toolbox.
Learn about important changes to AuthenticationServices.
Learn about important changes to Bundle Resources.
Learn about important changes to ContactsUI.
An extension other apps use to access files and folders managed by your app and synced with a remote storage.
Creates a new file provider domain with the specified URL and display name.
A list of known folders that the domain currently replicates.
A list of known folders that the domain can replicate.
An error indicating that there isn’t an app extension within the app bundle.
An error indicating that there isn’t a registered domain for the corresponding identifier.
An error indicating that the system is unable to service requests for the domain temporarily, and you can try again later.
An error indicating that the File Provider manager can’t find the specified provider.
Determines whether to connect to a domain from another device.
A protocol that defines the interface for sharing known-folder locations with the system.
Checks whether the specified URL is eligible for storing a domain.
Asks the domain to sync the specified known folders.
Asks the system to stop replicating the specified known folders in the domain.
Returns a URL for a directory for storing state information for the domain.

featured.svg.alt: An icon, with a star and a speech bubble around it, representing updates.
